basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Karen J. Dowd Endowed Scholarship

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the department of Kinesiology and Health Studies within College of Education Professional Studies Eligibility Requirements Students within the department of Kinesiology and Health Studies within College of Education Professional Studies Must be an undergraduate student pursuing a degree in Kinesiology or a graduate student pursuing a degree in Wellness Management Must have a minimum 2.50 GPA for Undergraduate and 3.0 GPA for Graduate Must upload a personal statement including career goals, financial need and evidence of professional development: volunteerism and/or organizational memberships. Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
